title: Henry Ford Jackson Hospital
description: Henry Ford Jackson Hospital is a leading health care and medical services provider in south central Michigan.
cleaned_text: Nearly $375 Million in Partnership with Henry Ford Health to Bring Shirley Ryan AbilityLab to Detroit and Create the Nick Gilbert Neurofibromatosis Research Institute](https://www.henryford.com/news/2023/09/gilbert-family-foundation-$375m-gift-will-bring-shirley-ryan-abilitylab-to-detroit) - World-renowned Shirley Ryan AbilityLab to partner with Henry Ford Health on inpatient rehabilitation hospital embedded within new patient tower at Henry Ford Hospital, with plans for expansion - First-of-its-kind neurofibromatosis (NF) institute, named after Dan and Jennifer Gilbert's late son, Nicolas, to house groundbreaking research advancing toward a cure for NF and increasing access to personalized care - Nick Gilbert Neurofibromatosis Research Institute to be housed inside the groundbreaking new Henry Ford Health + Michigan State University Health Sciences research facility
